defined.name: realm
defined.documentation: Sea ice realm specialization

defined.name: topic
defined.documentation: Sea Ice grid

defined.name: discretisation
defined.documentation: Sea ice discretisation

defined.name: horizontal
defined.documentation: Sea ice discretisation in the horizontal

defined.name: vertical
defined.documentation: Sea ice vertical properties

defined.name: seaice_categories
defined.documentation: What method is used to represent sea ice categories ?

defined.name: snow_on_seaice
defined.documentation: Snow on sea ice details

defined.name: grid
defined.documentation: Grid on which sea ice is horizontal discretised?

enumeration_members.documentation: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the ocean grid
Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the atmospheric grid
Sea ice is horizontally discretised on its own independent grid

defined.name: grid_type
defined.documentation: What is the type of sea ice grid?

enumeration_members.documentation: Computational grid changes during the run

defined.name: scheme
defined.documentation: What is the advection scheme?

defined.name: thermodynamics_time_step
defined.documentation: What is the time step in the sea ice model thermodynamic component in seconds.

defined.name: dynamics_time_step
defined.documentation: What is the time step in the sea ice model dynamic component in seconds.

defined.name: additional_details
defined.documentation: Specify any additional horizontal discretisation details.

defined.name: layering
defined.documentation: What type of sea ice vertical layers are implemented for purposes of thermodynamic calculations?

enumeration_members.documentation: Simulation has no internal ice thermodynamics.
Simulation uses two layers.
Simulation uses more than two layers

defined.name: number_of_layers
defined.documentation: If using multi-layers specify how many.

defined.name: additional_details
defined.documentation: Specify any additional vertical grid details.

defined.name: has_mulitple_categories
defined.documentation: Set to true if the sea ice model has multiple sea ice categories.

defined.name: number_of_categories
defined.documentation: If using sea ice categories specify how many.

defined.name: category_limits
defined.documentation: If using sea ice categories specify each of the category limits.

defined.name: ice_thickness_distribution_scheme
defined.documentation: Describe the sea ice thickness distribution scheme

defined.name: other
defined.documentation: If the sea ice model does not use sea ice categories specify any additional details.

defined.name: has_snow_on_ice
defined.documentation: Is snow on ice represented in this model?

defined.name: number_of_snow_levels
defined.documentation: Number of vertical levels of snow on ice?

defined.name: snow_fraction
defined.documentation: Describe how the snow fraction on sea ice is determined

defined.name: additional_details
defined.documentation: Specify any additional details related to snow on ice.

defined.name: topic
defined.documentation: Sea Ice key properties

defined.name: variables
defined.documentation: List of prognostic variable in the sea ice model.

defined.name: seawater_properties
defined.documentation: Properties of seawater relevant to sea ice

defined.name: resolution
defined.documentation: Resolution in the sea ice grid

defined.name: tuning_applied
defined.documentation: Tuning applied to sea ice model component

defined.name: assumptions
defined.documentation: Assumptions made in the sea ice model

defined.name: conservation
defined.documentation: Conservation in the sea ice component

defined.name: prognostic
defined.documentation: List of prognostic variables in the sea ice component.

enumeration_members.documentation: Snow on ice temperature
Snow on ice thickness

defined.name: ocean_freezing_point
defined.documentation: Equation used to compute the freezing point (in deg C) of seawater, as a function of salinity and pressure

enumeration_members.documentation: Thermodynamic equation of seawater 2010
Constant value of seawater freezing point is used.

defined.name: ocean_freezing_point_value
defined.documentation: If using a constant seawater freezing point, specify this value.

defined.name: name
defined.documentation: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid e.g. N512L180, T512L70, ORCA025 etc.

defined.name: canonical_horizontal_resolution
defined.documentation: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

defined.name: number_of_horizontal_gridpoints
defined.documentation: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

defined.name: description
defined.documentation: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained.  Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

defined.name: target
defined.documentation: What was the aim of tuning, e.g. correct sea ice minima, correct seasonal cycle.

defined.name: simulations
defined.documentation: Which simulations had tuning applied, e.g. all, not historical, only pi-control?

defined.name: metrics_used
defined.documentation: List any observed metrics used in tuning model/parameters

defined.name: variables
defined.documentation: Which variables were changed during the tuning process?

defined.name: description
defined.documentation: General overview description of any *key* assumptions made in this model.

defined.name: on_diagnostic_variables
defined.documentation: Note any assumptions that specifically affect the CMIP6 diagnostic sea ice variables.

defined.name: missing_processes
defined.documentation: List any *key* processes missing in this model configuration? Provide full details where this affects the CMIP6 diagnostic sea ice variables?

defined.name: description
defined.documentation: Provide a general description of conservation methodology.

defined.name: properties
defined.documentation: Properties conserved in sea ice by the numerical schemes.

defined.name: budget
defined.documentation: For each conserved property, specify the output variables which close the related budgets.

defined.name: was_flux_correction_used
defined.documentation: Does conservation involved flux correction?

defined.name: corrected_conserved_prognostic_variables
defined.documentation: List any variables which are conserved by *more* than the numerical scheme alone.

defined.name: topic
defined.documentation: Sea Ice Dynamics

defined.name: horizontal_transport
defined.documentation: What is the method of horizontal advection of sea ice?

enumeration_members.documentation: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

defined.name: transport_in_thickness_space
defined.documentation: What is the method of sea ice transport in thickness space (i.e. in thickness categories)?

enumeration_members.documentation: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

defined.name: ice_strength_formulation
defined.documentation: Which method of sea ice strength formulation is used?

defined.name: redistribution
defined.documentation: Which processes can redistribute sea ice?

defined.name: rheology
defined.documentation: Rheology, what is the ice deformation formulation?

enumeration_members.documentation: VP
EVP

defined.name: topic
defined.documentation: Sea Ice Thermodynamics

defined.name: energy
defined.documentation: Processes related to energy in sea ice thermodynamics

defined.name: mass
defined.documentation: Processes related to mass in sea ice thermodynamics

defined.name: salt
defined.documentation: Processes related to salt in sea ice thermodynamics.

defined.name: mass_transport
defined.documentation: Mass transport of salt

defined.name: thermodynamics
defined.documentation: Salt thermodynamics

defined.name: ice_thickness_distribution
defined.documentation: Ice thickness distribution details.

defined.name: melt_ponds
defined.documentation: Characteristics of melt ponds.

defined.name: snow_processes
defined.documentation: Thermodynamic processes in snow on sea ice

defined.name: enthalpy_formulation
defined.documentation: What is the energy formulation?

enumeration_members.value: Pure ice latent and sensible heat
Pure ice latent and sensible heat + brine heat reservoir (Semtner 3-layer)
Pure ice latent and sensible heat + explicit brine inclusions (Bitz and Lipscomb)

defined.name: thermal_conductivity
defined.documentation: What type of thermal conductivity is used?

defined.name: heat_diffusion
defined.documentation: What is the method of heat diffusion?

enumeration_members.value: Conduction, radiation and latent heat transport

defined.name: basal_heat_flux
defined.documentation: Method by which basal ocean heat flux is handled?

enumeration_members.documentation: Brine inclusions treated as a heat reservoir
Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity)
Thermal properties depend on S-T (with varying salinity

defined.name: fixed_salinity_value
defined.documentation: If you have selected {Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity)}, supply fixed salinity value for each sea ice layer.

defined.name: heat_content_precip
defined.documentation: Describe the method by which the heat content of precipitation is handled.

defined.name: new_ice_formation
defined.documentation: Describe the method by which new sea ice is formed in open water.

defined.name: ice_vertical_growth_and_melt
defined.documentation: Describe the method that governs the vertical growth and melt of sea ice.

defined.name: ice_lateral_melting
defined.documentation: What is the method of sea ice lateral melting?

defined.name: ice_surface_sublimation
defined.documentation: Describe the method that governs sea ice surface sublimation.

defined.name: frazil_ice
defined.documentation: Describe the method of frazil ice formation.

defined.name: has_multiple_sea_ice_salinities
defined.documentation: Does the sea ice model use two different salinities: one for thermodynamic calculations; and one for the salt budget?

defined.name: sea_ice_salinity_thermal_impacts
defined.documentation: Does sea ice salinity impact the thermal properties of sea ice?

defined.name: salinity_type
defined.documentation: How is salinity determined in the mass transport of salt calculation?

defined.name: constant_salinity_value
defined.documentation: If using a constant salinity value specify this value in PSU?

defined.name: additional_details
defined.documentation: Describe the salinity profile used.

defined.name: salinity
defined.documentation: How is salinity determined in the thermodynamic calculation?

defined.name: constant_salinity_value
defined.documentation: If using a constant salinity value specify this value in PSU?

defined.name: additional_details
defined.documentation: Describe the salinity profile used.

defined.name: representation
defined.documentation: How is the sea ice thickness distribution represented?

enumeration_members.value: Virtual (enhancement of thermal conductivity, thin ice melting)

defined.name: are_included
defined.documentation: Are melt ponds included in the sea ice model?

defined.name: formulation
defined.documentation: What method of melt pond formulation is used?

defined.name: impacts
defined.documentation: What do melt ponds have an impact on?

defined.name: has_snow_aging
defined.documentation: Set to True if the sea ice model has a snow aging scheme.

defined.name: snow_aging_scheme
defined.documentation: Describe the snow aging scheme.

defined.name: has_snow_ice_formation
defined.documentation: Set to True if the sea ice model has snow ice formation.

defined.name: snow_ice_formation_scheme
defined.documentation: Describe the snow ice formation scheme.

defined.name: redistribution
defined.documentation: What is the impact of ridging on snow cover?

defined.name: heat_diffusion
defined.documentation: What is the heat diffusion through snow methodology in sea ice thermodynamics?

defined.name: topic
defined.documentation: Sea Ice Radiative Processes

defined.name: surface_albedo
defined.documentation: Method used to handle surface albedo.

enumeration_members.documentation: Sea ice albedo is parameterized
Albedo value has a spectral dependence

defined.name: ice_radiation_transmission
defined.documentation: Method by which solar radiation through sea ice is handled.

enumeration_members.documentation: Radiation transmission through ice is different for each sea ice category
